clinical_history: Patient with unexplained weight loss and fever.
findings: Focal increased uptake in mediastinal lymph nodes, recommend further correlation with CT morphology.
Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in mediastinal lymph nodes, suggestive of malignancy.
Physiologic brown fat uptake in supraclavicular region.
No abnormal FDG uptake in the remaining organs.
Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
recommendations: Refer to oncology or specialist for further management.
